1216480.name: Get the Banana
1216480.description:
Get the Banana is a Sokoban-inspired game centered around two different but related characters: a monkey trapped in a research project involving a set of puzzles, and a research assistant helping to conduct the experiment. The game contains 12 puzzles involving pushable objects as well as doors, powered wires, fire and explosives, and more.

Contents/Features:

  • 12 puzzles, involving a variety of objects and tools
  • An original story based around a team of researchers
